contentrichtext.text: {{Wiktionary|mama|mamma}} '''Mama'''('''s''') or '''Mamma'''('''s''') may refer to: * [[Mother]], a female parent * [[Mamma (anatomy)]] or breast, the upper ventral region of a mammal’s torso {{TOC right}} == Film and television == * ''[[Ma-ma]]'', a 1977 Soviet–French–Romanian musical film * [[Mama (1990 film)|''Mama'' (1990 film)]], a Chinese film directed by Zhang Yuan * [[Mama (2013 film)|''Mama'' (2013 film)]], a feature-length adaptation of a 2008 short by Andres Muschietti, produced by Guillermo del Toro * [[Mama (TV series)|''Mama'' (TV series)]], a 1949–1957 American comedy–drama series * [[Thelma Harper]] or "Mama", a fictional character played by Vicki Lawrence on ''The Carol Burnett Show'' and the sitcom ''Mama's Family'' == Literature == * [[Mama (magazine)|''Mama'' (magazine)]], a Swedish magazine * "Mama", a short story by Dorothy Allison in the 1988 collection ''[[Trash: Short Stories]]'' * ''Mamma'', a 1908 novel by [[Rhoda Broughton]] == Music == * [[Mnet Asian Music Awards]] (MAMA), an annual South Korean music awards show * ''Mama'', a 1996 stage musical by [[Mbongeni Ngema]] * MAMA Records, an American label distributed by [[Summit Records]] === Albums === * [[Mama (Nomeansno album)|''Mama'' (Nomeansno album)]], 1982 * [[Mama (Vitas album)|''Mama'' (Vitas album)]], or the title song, 2003 * [[Mama (EP)|''Mama'' (EP)]], an EP by EXO, or the title song (see below), 2012 === Songs === * [[Mama (David Whitfield song)|"Mama" (David Whitfield song)]], also covered by Connie Francis and others * [[Mama (EXO song)|"Mama" (EXO song)]] * [[Mama (Genesis song)|"Mama" (Genesis song)]] * [[Mama (Il Divo song)|"Mama" (Il Divo song)]] * [[Mama (Spice Girls song)|"Mama" (Spice Girls song)]] * [[Mama (Tozzi & Branigan song)|"Mama" (Tozzi & Branigan song)]] * "[[Mama (Ana Ahabak)]]", a song by Christina Stürmer * "[[Mama (Loves a Crackhead)]]", a song by Plan B * "Mama", a song by [[B. J. Thomas]] * "Mama", a song by Beth Hart from ''[[Screamin' for My Supper]]'' * "Mama", a song by Electric Light Orchestra from ''[[ELO 2]]'' * "Mama", a song by Godsmack from ''[[IV (Godsmack album)|IV]]'' * "Mama", a song by [[The Kelly Family]] * "Mama", a song by The Lonely Island from ''[[Turtleneck & Chain]]'' * "Mama", a song by Lyfe Jennings from ''[[I Still Believe (album)|I Still Believe]]'' * "Mama", a song by My Chemical Romance from ''[[The Black Parade]]'' * "Mama", a song by Oingo Boingo from ''[[Boi-ngo]]'' * "Mama", a song by The Sugarcubes from ''[[Life's Too Good]]'' * "Mama", a song by The-Dream from ''[[Love Hate]]'' * "Mama", a song by Toto from ''[[Hydra (Toto album)|Hydra]]'' * "Mama", a song by [[Vladimir Arzumanyan]] ==Places== *[[Mama, Yucatán]], a [[municipalities of Yucatán|municipality of Yucatán]] *[[Mama, Russia]], an urban-type settlement in Mamsko-Chuysky District of Irkutsk Oblast, Russia **[[Mama Airport]], an airport there == Religion and mythology == * [[Mammes of Caesarea]] or Mammas, semi-legendary child-martyr of the 3rd century * [[Mami (goddess)]] or Mama, a goddess in the Babylonian epic Atra-Hasis * [[Ninhursag]] or Mamma, a Sumerian earth goddess == Other uses == * [[Mama (software)]], an object-oriented programming language * [[MAMA]], an art gallery in Rotterdam, The Netherlands * [[MAMA Group]], a live venue and artist management company * [[Massachusetts Academy of Math and Science at WPI]] (MAMAS) * Mama Noodles, a Thai brand of instant noodles by [[Thai President Foods]] * Mamma.com, a metasearch engine operated by [[Copernic]] == See also == * [[Mama and papa]], in linguistics, the sequences of sounds corresponding to the words for "mother" and "father" * [[Mama-san]], in Japan and East Asia, a woman in a position of authority * ''[[Ma-Mha]]'', a 2007 Thai film * [[Mame (disambiguation)]] * [[Mami (disambiguation)]] * [[Maternal insult]] or "yo mama joke" * ''[[Momma]]'', a syndicated comic strip {{Disambiguation|geo}}
